Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Match

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Match
  • public class Match
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a specific match. It contains all the players, the map, the killshot track and the stacks of the current match. It also contains turn-related information. It embeds the logic for point calculation after killing and creation of possible actions during a turn.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int actionsCompleted
      It's the number of action completed by the current player
      private boolean alreadyCompleted
      True if the player has already completed its turn (used for restoring match)

      It's the reference to the current action
      private Player currentPlayer
      It's the reference to the current player

      It's true if frenzy mode is on, otherwise it's false

      It's the KillShotTrack of the match

      It's the selected layout of the match

      It's the number of action that the current player can do

      It's the reference to the map of observers in gameModel

      It's true if the current player can only setLoad his weapons, otherwise it's false

      It contains the list of the players

      It's the stackManager
      private boolean turnCompletable
      It's true if the turn is completable, otherwise it's false
      private java.util.List<Player> waitingFor
      List containing players from which an action is required (used for timers)

      • getCurrentPlayer

        public Player getCurrentPlayer()
        Gets the current player. A player remains current until the next has EFFECTIVELY started its turn. While someone is spawning, the current palyer is the player before him.
        Returns:
        a reference to a player or null (if the first player has not already spawned)

      • setCurrentPlayer

        Sets the current player
        Parameters:
        currentPlayer - the player to set

        Returns all the players on squares
        Parameters:
        squares - The squares to analyze
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing found players; it could be empty

      • compare

        private int compare​(Player p1,
                    Player p2)
        Compare the number of killings between two players
        Parameters:
        p1 - a player
        p2 - the player to compare
        Returns:
        an integer less than 0 if p2 has killed more than p1

        public void spawn​(Player p,
                  AmmoColor c)
        Set the position of a player to the proper SpawnPoint
        Parameters:
        p - The player to be spawned
        c - The color of the SpawnPoint

      • endTurnCheck

        public java.util.List<Player> endTurnCheck()
        At the end of the turn, check if some players is dead: in this case, their DamageTrack will be scored. Then, if there are at least two deaths, the active player will get an additional point. If frenzy has to be activated (last skull removed), it activates frenzy and set the flag 'isBeforeFirst' in each player. If frenzy mode is true, switches to frenzy all the dead players and, in the end, calls resetAfterDeathAll on them
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all the dead players; it could be empty

      • createSelectableActions

        public java.util.List<Action> createSelectableActions​(Player p)
        Creates a list of possible action a player can take, according to his adrenaline and turn status Must be called after the first action has been taken. Also sets turnCompletable true if the player can choose to end his turn
        Parameters:
        p - The player which is in CHOOSE_ACTION state
        Returns:
        the list with the possible action

      • createAdrenalinicAction

        private java.util.List<Action> createAdrenalinicAction​(Player p)
        Creates the adrenalinic actions (for normal mode) according to the adrenaline level of the player
        Parameters:
        p - the player in CHOOSE_ACTION state
        Returns:
        a list of actions

      • createFrenzyActions

        private java.util.List<Action> createFrenzyActions​(Player p)
        Creates the frenzy actions (for frenzy mode) according to the game order of the player
        Parameters:
        p - the player in CHOOSE_ACTION state
        Returns:
        a list of actions

      • initSelectableActions

        public java.util.List<Action> initSelectableActions​(Player p)
        Creates the list of action a player can take. Must be called at the beginning of his turn. It also initializes support variables to keep track of the turn status.
        Parameters:
        p - A player in the beginning of his turn, while is in CHOOSE_ACTION state.
        Returns:
        the list of actions he can take

      • updateTurnStatus

        public void updateTurnStatus​(Action a)
        Updates the turn status (number of remaining actions, the player can only setLoad)
        Parameters:
        a - The action chosen by the player, the status is updated according to it

      • getCurrentAction

        public Action getCurrentAction()
        Gets the action currently in progress. currentAction also stores support variables related to it (the weapon and the modes currently selected, the effects to take, etc)
        Returns:
        the reference to the current action

        Parameters:
        currentAction - The action just chosen by the player

      • switchToFrenzyAll

        private void switchToFrenzyAll​(java.util.List<Player> deadPlayers)
        Substitutes player's damageTrack with a FrenzyDamageTrack
        Parameters:
        deadPlayers - Only dead players can switch to frenzy

      • resetAfterDeathAll

        private void resetAfterDeathAll​(java.util.List<Player> deadPlayers)
        Resets all dead players' damage track (same marks, same skulls, no damages)
        Parameters:
        deadPlayers - Only dead players can reset own damage track

      • getDeadPlayers

        private java.util.List<Player> getDeadPlayers()
        Returns all the dead players
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all the dead players

      • scoreDamageTrack

        public void scoreDamageTrack​(java.util.Map<Player,​java.lang.Integer> points)
        At the end of the turn, if a player is dead, each other player gets his own points
        Parameters:
        points - A map containing how many points will be added to each other player

        public boolean isTurnCompletable()

        Returns:

        public void addWaitingFor​(Player p)
        Adds a player to the list of players from which and interaction is expected. Uniqueness is preserved.
        Parameters:
        p - the player to add

        public boolean removeWaitingFor​(Player p)
        Removes a player from the list of player from which and interaction is expected
        Parameters:
        p - the player to remove
        Returns:
        true if the player was found

      • getNextPlayer

        public Player getNextPlayer​(Player currP)
        Gets the next player in order of game, without checking his activity state
        Parameters:
        currP - the player which is current now
        Returns:
        the next player

        Gets the first player of the game
        Returns:
        the reference to the first player

      • notifyLayotUpdate

        public void notifyLayotUpdate()
        Updates all the observer about the weapons and ammoTiles on the map

      • notifyKillShotTrackUpdate

        public void notifyKillShotTrackUpdate()
        Updates all the observer about the killings in the killshottrack and the frenzy status. Updates each observer with points of the corresponding player.

      • notifyCurrentPlayerUpdate

        public void notifyCurrentPlayerUpdate()
        Updates all the observer with the new current player

      • notifyStartMatchUpdate

        public void notifyStartMatchUpdate()
        Communicates to all the observers that a match is started (or is in progress, in case of relogin) Updates them with the number of layout configuration, the names of all the players in the match and their colors

      • notifyPlayerUpdate

        public void notifyPlayerUpdate​(Player player)
        Updates all the observers with information about the spedified player: state, position and wallet. Information is sent as strings (unique identifiers)
        Parameters:
        player - the player subject of information

      • notifyPaymentUpdate

        public void notifyPaymentUpdate​(Player receiver)
        Updates the observer of a player (only it) about the amount of ammos he has to pay and he has already paid
        Parameters:
        receiver - the subject of the payment, which corresponds also the receiving observer

      • notifyWeaponsUpdate

        public void notifyWeaponsUpdate​(Player player)
        Updates all observers about the weapons of the specified player. Unload weapons are send to everyone, while the loaded ones are sent explicitly only to the observer of the involved player, other observers only know the number. Weapons are sent as string of the name.
        Parameters:
        player - the player subject of the update

      • notifyPowerUpUpdate

        public void notifyPowerUpUpdate​(Player player)
        Updates all observers with the powerUps of the specified player. Only his observer receives the list with the names of powerUps, other only know the number.
        Parameters:
        player - the player subject of the update

      • notifyDamageUpdate

        public void notifyDamageUpdate​(Player damaged)
        Updates all observers with damages and marks regarding the specified player. Update message is equal for every observer.
        Parameters:
        damaged - the player subject of the update

      • notifySelectableUpdate

        public void notifySelectableUpdate​(Player player)
        Updates the observer with the selectable items of the corresponding player. The update message is specific of the receiver.
        Parameters:
        player - the receiving player

      • notifySelectablesUpdateAllPlayers

        public void notifySelectablesUpdateAllPlayers()
        Updates all players with their specific updates of selectable items

      • notifyFullUpdateAllPlayers

        public void notifyFullUpdateAllPlayers()
        Updates all observers with the complete set of information regarding the match in progress

      • notifyGameOver

        public void notifyGameOver()
        Sends to all observers the rank and final scoring of each player, and states the end of the game.
